BESA.Remote

Class PongThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • BESA.Remote.PongThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PongSocketThread

    public class PongThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class represents PongThread manejo de la recepcion y tratamiento de los mensajes de multicast
    Since:
    JDK1.0
